definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Be wise in deed, not word.
sentences.chinese: 聪明见行为，空话不顶用。

sentences.english: White of wall be of use, and doorcase and window frame use as same as metope color.
sentences.chinese: 墙顶用白色，而门框及窗框采用与墙面相同的色彩。

sentences.english: Naturally, there are plenty who are skeptical of something like this ever working.
sentences.chinese: 自然，也有许多人怀疑这样的东西究竟顶不顶用。

sentences.english: The pillars sustain the roof of the pit.
It could work. It may also be completely unnecessary.
sentences.chinese: 这种方式可能会顶用，也可能完全是渣。

sentences.english: No solution is perfect when data is missing.
sentences.chinese: 如果数据缺失，那么什么方案都不顶用了。

sentences.english: The helpful boy carried my bags for me.
sentences.chinese: 这个挺顶用的男孩帮我搬运提包。

sentences.english: They were inexperienced, so maybe two heads would be better than one.
sentences.chinese: 他们都没有经验，所以两个人一起总比一个人顶用。

definition: easy to use/to function well/so that/in order to
(coll.) unable to withstand/cannot bear/can't stand it/no match for
at one's wit's end/unable to find a way out

apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
to act rashly/to act precipitously regardless of the consequences/reckless/foolhardy/daredevil
to be unable to bear or support
to seem/to appear/(in a negative or interrogative sentence) to be sure
